# ResolvedModifier

**Associated Type**

The type of modifier to use after being resolved.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype ResolvedModifier : ViewModifier
```

## Resolving a modifier

- **resolve(in:)**: Resolve to a concrete modifier in the given `environment`.

items.description: Resolve to a concrete modifier in the given `environment`.
items.name: resolve(in:)
